name: Glint Bike Wheel Kit Reflector Stickers
description: There's no need to install big, heavy, bulky reflectors to your spokes if you want to be seen. With enough reflective stickers for 2 wheels, this kit will keep you visible on rides from dusk till dawn. Weighing only 5g in total, these 12 stickers won't hold you back.12 reflective stickers per kit.Compatible with 26in., 27.5in., 29in. and 700c wheel sizes.Rated to last at least 7 years in the harshest conditions.Semi-permanent adhesive allows for removal of stickers if desired.Can be applied to any material including carbon fibre and aluminum.Made of durable and high-grade vinyl.
